message.body: Hello Jurgen. How's it going for you today?
Sounds good. Any plans to take advantage of the nice weather.
Had to pull out a jacket today instead of the lighter outerwear I've been getting by with for the last few days.
Yesterday I walked in from home. Today, probably I'll get outside for a break and stroll around a bit in mid-afternoon
Better than sitting in the chair all day and taking root!
And something to focus eyes on further than 2' or fifty ft away
Yeah it really cooled off. I usually need to walk around at least a bit during the day or else I start to feel like I'm going a little stir crazy.
I don't always *feel* it, but it happens just the same. I love top look up at the sky almost as soon as I go out, just to get the feel into my bones and
Totally understandable. I find myself fascinated by cloud formations, similar to mountains in that one can be easily awed by their immense size.
